reviews.text:
Dunrobin Castle Railway Station is a lovely little station ON CALL, meaning you need to stand next to the railway and wave with your hand to give a sign  to the driver to stop the train on time. Be aware that you need to clim those stairs that are at the station. In the case you are carring a bike as it was in my case than better be strong enough to pick it up yourself or make sure to ask someone to help you .-)
Otherwise the station house is getting ready to become a museum. A lovely litte house.
The station is verz conviniet to visit the Dunrubin Castle, just a few 100 m away from the Castle. The Dunrubin Caslte is beautiful, so its the Falcons show. Do not leave the Castle without seeing the Falcon show. The guy presenting it is very knowlidable and his birds are spectacular. Strongly recommended.
Fantastic and charming place, professional and friendly service. Amazing interior, very clean. Falconry showcases - perfect. I highly recommend this place.
Great place to visit. Best Scottish castle so far
Brilliant place. The birds of prey was amazing
